sentences.sentence: In this perspective, we have an image of the awesome power of the Deity himself thundering away behind every jot and tittle of Milton's great epic.
sentences.translation: 从这个角度来看，我们可以看到弥尔顿伟大史诗的每一处细节背后，都隐藏着神自己的强大力量。

sentences.sentence: I forgot the tittle of the film.
Not once do any of these creatures disobey one jot or tittle of the laws of physics.
sentences.translation: 所有的这些生物从未有丝毫违背过物理学定律。
